## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have run `flutter analyze` and resolved all issues

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on both Android and iOS (if applicable)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated the ARCHITECTURE.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated inline code documentation
- [ ] I have added/updated relevant comments

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have updated `pubspec.yaml` if I added dependencies
- [ ] All new dependencies are necessary and justified
- [ ] I have run `flutter pub get`

### Security
- [ ] My changes don't expose sensitive information
- [ ] I haven't committed API keys, tokens, or credentials
- [ ] I have followed security best practices

### Firebase (if applicable)
- [ ] I have tested Firebase functionality
- [ ] Security rules are updated (if needed)
- [ ] I have documented any Firebase configuration changes
